text.p: Let [mathjaxinline]C_1[/mathjaxinline] be the standard matrix for [mathjaxinline]T_1[/mathjaxinline] from the previous question, and let [mathjaxinline]C_2[/mathjaxinline] be the standard matrix for [mathjaxinline]T_2[/mathjaxinline].

solution.font: A transformation from [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ n[/mathjaxinline] to [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^ m[/mathjaxinline] has standard matrix of size [mathjaxinline]m \times n[/mathjaxinline].
